question.ask: 1. How do you like your maths teacher?

std.value: He is interesting and ready to answer all the difficult questions.
std.ai: He is interesting and ready to answer all the difficult questions.

std.value: I appreciate him very much. He is so smart and can solve any questions that I cannot.
std.ai: I appreciate him very much. He is so smart and can solve any questions that I cannot.

question.keywords: love|interesting ready answer questions|appreciate smart solve questions

question.ask: 2. Can you speak a little louder please?

std.value: Oh, of course. Could you hear me now?
std.ai: Oh, of course. Could you hear me now?

std.value: Sure. Can you hear clearly now?
std.ai: Sure. Can you hear clearly now?

std.value: OK, what about the voice now?
std.ai: OK, what about the voice now?

std.value: Thank you. I hope it can be useful to you.
std.ai: Thank you. I hope it can be useful to you.

std.value: Thanks. I hope my speech can also help you.
std.ai: Thanks. I hope my speech can also help you.

question.keywords: Thank you flattered|Thank you hope useful|Thanks hope help

question.ask: 4. I’m sorry that I’ve taken your umbrella by mistake.
